3: As I thought, the further we go, the more the Corrupted.
Not wise to enact exactly what they intended us to.
Though corrupted, they are still only normal mechanoids. Their sensors still only consist of visual scanning devices.
If we can weave through them, we can avoid combat.
Everyone, sheathe your weapons. Use their blind spots to go deeper into the ruins.
I'm prepared to enter stealth mode.
